short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to contact people on Social

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Writly helps users generate high-quality written cold outreach messages quickly by using advanced AI technology, offering multiple templates and customization options for cold outreach.
